Technical Product Manager - Terminal Application Architecture - CTO Office

Defining next-generation Terminal architecture with emphasis on interoperability,
composability, and AI integration. Leading platform standards and frameworks to
enhance developer productivity across Bloomberg's application ecosystem.

7+ years in technical product management, background building application SDKs,
frameworks, or platforms. Strong stakeholder management and technical documentation
skills. Experience with web technologies (JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, React)
and emerging AI frameworks.

hero.subheadline: Senior Technical PM with 8 years shipping developer-facing platforms—from enterprise blockchain infrastructure at Microsoft to institutional crypto APIs at Anchorage. Expert in SDK architecture, platform interoperability, and balancing technical excellence with rapid delivery.

about.tagline: Eight years building developer platforms where technical rigor meets pragmatic delivery—from Xbox smart contracts to ETF-grade staking APIs. Now focused on next-generation application architecture.
bio:
Currently at Anchorage Digital, I lead protocol integrations and staking APIs for institutional clients—designing extensible frameworks that balance security, performance, and developer experience. I've shipped 7+ L2 protocol integrations (Optimism, Base, Arbitrum) with consistent API patterns that scale. Before that, I built Wallet-as-a-Service SDKs at Forte and Flow CLI/Cadence Playground developer tools at Dapper Labs—reducing time-to-first-deploy by 60%.
I started at Microsoft shipping one of the first production smart contracts in enterprise—Xbox royalties on Ethereum, requiring Docker/K8s infrastructure and API design for non-technical stakeholders. I'm drawn to problems at the intersection of technical depth and organizational scale: defining platform standards, championing best practices, and building tools that make developers more productive. Bloomberg's focus on Terminal architecture, interoperability, and AI integration aligns perfectly with my experience.
